112.content:
Jenna felt herself being carried across the beach. She opened her eyes in surprise, "Hey! What are you doing!"

Abby giggled, "Nothing..."

Jenna squirmed out of Abby's arms and fell onto the soft sand. Abby jumped on top of her and began to tickle her bare sides. Both girls were wearing only bikinis, so their tummies and armpits were exposed. Jenna squealed and rolled over Abby. She grabbed Abby's arms and pinned them over her head, being sure to trap them in her knees.

Now Jenna was sitting on Abby arms which made Abby completely helpless. Jenna wiggled her fingers in the air over Abby's tummy. Abby started giggling and squirming with ticklish anticipation. Then Jenna started furiously scribbling her fingers over Abby's soft tummy. She scratched up and down and goosed her tummy. Abby shrieked "AHAHAHHAHAHAHAH NOOOOO STAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPP HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!" She bucked and tried to roll over but was trapped. Then Jenna started wiggling her fingers in Abby's armpits, lightly scratching. Abby laughed loudly and tried to sit up, "NOOOOOOO NOOOTTT THEREEEEE HAHAHAHAHAHA!!"

Jenna giggled to herself, that her sister was so ticklish. This went on for a few more minutes until Jenna decided to let Abby up. Abby lay on the sand, panting and giggling still.
112.title: Jenna wakes up and jumps out of Abby's arms...

1121.content:
Jenna and Abby looked up to see a young woman approaching them from across the beach

She reached them and smiled, "Hi, my name is Carrie. I couldn't help but notice you tickling each other. You must be really ticklish!"

Abby giggled, "Yeah. I'm Abby and this is my sister Jenna." They all shook hands and greeted each other.

"So this might be a little random," said Carrie, "But I work for a Tickle Challenge Game Show on TV that is looking for more players. All you have to do is be tickled for a certain amount of time and if you win, you will make some money. And you would also be paid for being on the show. Would you be interested in something like this.."

Jenna and Abby started smiling, "We love getting tickled," giggled Jenna, "And we don't have much to do this summer!" They both looked at Carrie, "We would love to do it!!"

Carrie smiled, "That's great!" She gave them her phone number and the details of the show. "It will take place next Wednesday at 10:00 a.m.. And it will be on live TV!. Call me when you have parent permission and we can settle the details. I'm so excited to have to you the show! Are you both as ticklish as Abby?'

Jenna looked at Abby and smiled. In answer to Carrie's question, Abby reached over and goosed Jenna's side. Jenna shrieked and jumped away. Carrie giggled, "It looks like you are, that will be fine!"

She said goodbye and walked away. Jenna and Abby looked at each other. "This is going to be so much fun!" said Abby. With that, she jumped on top of Jenna and straddled her waist. "And now, my dear, you are going to pay for what you just did." She began to scribble her fingers over Jenna's sides . Jenna squealed and bucked, trying to escape Abby fingers, "HAHAHAHAHAH STOOPPPP HEHEHEHEHE!!!"
1121.title: A young woman nearby on the beach approaches th...

11211.content:
Jenna, Abby and their mother arrived at the TV station at 9:00, where the game show would be taking place. Outside of the broadcast room they found Carrie. "Hi!" she exclaimed." You must be Jenna and Abby's mother!"

"Yes, I am." said the girls' mother, "My name is Janice. It's nice to meet you and thanks for asking the girls to be on the show!"

"Oh, it's our pleasure!" said Carrie. "Right this way girls, we'll get you all ready. We have an hour until show time."

Carrie took the girls and their mother on stage to she the set explained the show to the girls. It was a large, fancy TV-like room with pink and silver decorations. In the middle of the room were two cushioned tables with wrist and ankle cuffs. "You will have to pass 5 levels to win the grand prize of 20,000 dollars! Each level will get harder and harder. You will wear a different outfit for each level as well. You will be tickled by two of our lovely staff members, who you will meet later! You will each be strapped to one of these comfortable tables where you will be tickled. The first level is 7 minutes, the second one 5, the third 4, the fourth 3 and the last 2. Your goal is to not say the mercy word within the time limits of each level. For this game, the mercy word is " Hairspray."

Jenna and Abby looked at each other nervously. This would be so much fun, but also really really hard! Their mother was smiling, "This is going to be so fun, girls! I need to go find my seat in the TV audience. Have fun!" She went to find her seat.

Carrie took the girls backstage to get their hair styled and their appearance made for the Game Show. The station was a bustle of people moving around and getting ready for the 10:00 start. They arrived at a dressing room with a sign on the door that said, "Tickle Challenge Ticklees. Jenna and Abby." "Alright girls, here we are! Someone will come to escort you to the stage when it is time. Good luck!" She gave each of them a hug and then opened the door for them.

Inside, there were several women standing by closets and mirrors. "Welcome girls!" one of them cooed. "We are here to help you get ready for the show"

Each girl sat in front of a mirror, as the ladies went to work on their hair and makeup.
11211.title: Game Show Time!!

112111.content:
It was 9:58, almost time for the show to begin. Jenna and Abby were all styled up and ready backstage to go onstage.

At 10:00, the cameras began rolling. Mike the announcer, walked onstage, "Welcome, welcome to today's tickle challenge." The audience clapped and cheered. "Today we have to competitors, sisters actually who will be competing for a prize of 20,000. Please welcome, Jenna and Abby!"

The crowd whooped and cheered as Jenna and Abby walked onstage. Their first outfit was winter wear. They each had on a cute fitted winter sweater, skinny jeans and fuzzy socks. They smiled at the cameras and walked over to the tables, laying down. They were strapped down with their feet in cuffs and their arms down by their sides.

The announcer said, "This will be our first level. The girls will be tickled for 7 minutes by our two staff ticklers here." From backstage, two young women walked out, dressed in cute, frilly midriff sweaters and miniskirts. They sauntered over to the girls. Jenna looked at Abby in shock, one of them was Carrie. The women took their places next to the girls. Carrie stood next to Abby and Bridget stood next to Jenna. Carrie whispered in Abby's ears, "Now I get to tickle you!" she grinned. Abby giggled quietly.

The announcer went on, "If the girls make it through the first 7 minutes without saying the word, "Hairspray", they advance to Level 2, with a more revealing outfit. Set the clocks. Ready, ticklers begin!!!"

The audience cheered as the bell rang and Carrie and Bridget began to tickle the girls. The winter wear outfit covered the girls completely, so it was difficult for the ticklers to find places to tickle. Carrie wiggled her fingers over Abby's collarbone, causing Abby to giggle and lower her chin. Bridget squeezed Jenna's sides through her sweater. It tickled, but not too much because of the material. Jenna giggled and squirmed.

Next, Bridget and Carrie began squeezing the girls' knees through their jeans. This actually tickled pretty much and the girls giggled out loud. The announcer walked around making comments, "These girls are very ticklish, but can they last!!!"

Soon the 7 minutes were up and the girls hadn't come close to saying, "Hairspray." However, the next level and new outfit would be more difficult.
112111.title: Level One

1121111.content:
For Level Two, the theme was Slumber Party. Each girl was dressed in a thin T-shirt, fuzzy pajama pants and thin socks. Their hair was pulled into a messy bun to show the "sleep" look.

The buzzer sounded and the girls has 5 minutes to be tickled.

This time, Carrie and Bridget focused on the feet of both girls. The socks they were wearing were very thin and easy to tickle through. Soon, they had both girls giggling and kicking.

After 2 minutes of foot tickling, Bridget moved up to Jenna's sides. She squeezed Jenna's sides through the thin material of the T-shirt. Jenna's arms were strapped by her sides and she tried to pull them in to cover her sides. She squirmed and giggled cutely, trying to evade Bridget's fingers.

Meanwhile, Carrie had Abby giggling by tickling her all over. She started at the feet and then squeezed her way up Abby's legs, over her tummy and around her neck.
Both girls were able to keep from saying "Hairspray" though.

The 5 minutes seemed to drag on, but finally the buzzer sounded and the girls were released. They smiled at the cameras and then headed backstage to get ready for the third round.
1121111.title: Level Two

11211111.content:
The announcer brought the audience back into focus after the commercial break, "And now it's time for Level Three!!! Both of our ticklish ladies are still going strong!"

The audience cheered.

Jenna and Abby came walking back onto the stage. This time, the theme was, "Prom Night". Both girls were dressed in short, strapless prom dress that showed off their legs and armpits. They wore nylons as well, making their feet more ticklish. Their hair was also styled fancily. They were strapped onto the tables, this time with their arms further away from their sides, to expose their ticklish armpits.

Carrie and Bridget walked on as well, but this time they switched ticklees. The two ticklers were still adorned in their cropped tops and mini skirts, showing off their beautiful legs and slim tummies. The two didn't know it yet, but if Jenna and Abby won the challenge, the two ticklers would be tickled in their outfits.

The buzzer sounded and the girls had 4 minutes to endure the tickling.

Carrie walked over to Jenna and smiled. She lost no time sticking her fingers in Jenna's armpits and tickling away. Jenna gasped and pulled at the straps holding her, trying to escape. She burst into giggles and squirmed on the padded table. Carrie began to banter, "Tickle, tickle, tickle!! Is someone ticklish?"

This made the sensation worse, "YESSSS!" laughed Jenna, "HAHAHAHAHA STAAAPPPP!"

The crowd laughed at Jenna's outburst and the announcer kept up the banter. There were many cameras zooming around the room and capturing each expression from the audience and the ticklish girls.

Meanwhile, Bridget was getting the same response from Abby as she tickled her stockinged feet and legs. The nylons made everything more ticklish and Abby giggled wildly. Bridget tickled the backs of Abby's knees and started scratching her inner thighs. "Tickle tickle, tickle!!" she bantered. "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HHEHEHEHE THAT TICKLES SO BADHAHAHAHAHAHA!" shrieked Abby, trying to kick her legs.

Both ticklers kept tickling away, until finally the four minutes were up. Both girls lay their panting after the intense tickle attack.

The announcer then announced that if the girls won, not only would they receive the prize but would get to tickle the ticklers for five minutes. With that, the show went to a commercial break.

The cameras shut off, missing the horrified expressions on Carrie and Bridget's faces. "What!!!" they both squealed. The show producer came out and nodded,"Yep girls, you work for this show, which includes getting tickled."

Carrie and Bridget were shocked. They turned to the girls, who were grinning at them. "Alright girls," said Bridget, "We're not going easy on you from now on. You are not going to win!"

Jenna and Abby winked at each other. "Oh yes we are!" Jenna reached over and goosed Carrie's bare side. Carrie shrieked and jumped away. The girls burst out laughing, "This is going to be so much fun!"

They went back stage to get ready for the next level.
11211111.title: Level 3

She pulled violently at the restraints and bucked, trying to escape Carrie's tickly fingers. Carrie laughed out loud and tickled harder, increasing the volume of Jenna's laughter.

Meanwhile, Bridget scribbled her fingers over the backs of Abby's knees. Abby giggled loudly and tried to flatten her legs on the table, but couldn't. She tried to kick but couldn't. All she could do was laugh. So laugh she did. Bridget moved up to Abby's bare thighs, evoking a higher-pitched squeal from the ticklish girl. Then, she moved to Abby's armpit, creating the loudest and most frantic laughter of all.

Both girls were in ticklish agony and weren't afraid to show it. They laughed and squealed and squirmed with all of their might. It was all both of them could do to not say, "Hairspray" to make the tickling stop.

Finally after what seemed like forever, the buzzer sounded. Three minutes were up. Carrie and Bridget tried not to show the devastation on their faces as they smirked at the camera and sauntered off stage. Carrie whispered to Bridget, "We'll get them on the next level.." Bridget smirked and nodded.

Jenna and Abby were released and they walked off stage, recooperating from the tickling. Jenna said, "We have to hang in there, just two minutes more of tickling!" Abby agreed, "Yeah, but the wardrobe of this next level is really difficult.

They headed to the dressing room and got ready for the final level of tickling.

10 seconds remained. Suddenly, Jenna felt as if she couldn't take it anymore. She opened her eyes and yelled,

"Okay, how about we do do that!" replied Jenna, her mood immediately picking up at the thought. Ashley was a girl in Abby's class. She was bright, pretty and very kind and pleasant by nature. She was never boring to spend time with. In fact she was one of Abby's best friends and one would regularly spend time over the other's house straight after school and on weekends. Jenna had gotten to know her quite well too from the number of times Ashley had visited their house to see Abby and therefore the three had become quite a close-knit group whenever they had the chance to get together. Like the two sisters, Ashley was incredibly ticklish and never wasted the chance to get into a tickle fight or initiate some other kind of tickle-oriented game.

Ashley lived only a few blocks away so it wasn't long before Abby and Jenna were standing on her doorstep ringing the doorbell.

"Do you think she's in?" asked Jenna hopefully.

"She should be, it's Saturday and I think she's expecting us."

It was at that moment that the front door swung open to reveal...
123.title: Ashley (14)

1231.content:
...Ashley, sporting her usual glowing smile at the sight of two of her closest friends.

"Hey guys, come on in!" she said cheerfully, stepping aside to allow them room into the corridor. Like the rest of the house it was nicely furnished, with framed family pictures hanging on the walls and a vase of flowers on the end table just next to the door. Jenna and Abby stepped forward down the corridor and into the kitchen as Ashley closed the door behind them. She then followed the sisters and gave them both an affectionate hug before offering them drinks, which they gladly accepted. Once three glasses of OJ had been served the three girls sat at the kitchen table and began to catch up as they hadn't gotten together in around two weeks. Ashley was wearing a blue t-shirt, green cargo pants and was barefoot. Jenna and Abby were both wearing jeans, with Abby having donned a red tank top that morning in contrast to Jenna's green tube top which showed off her bellybutton. Both sisters had removed their shoes and socks and left them in the hall, as was practically traditional to them whenever they were visiting friends.

"Great to see you Ashley! How have you been? It's been like forever!" exclaimed Abby .

"I know, right! I've been good, just doing the usual, homework, chores, that sort of thing. Sorry I haven't been in touch much lately, I've just had a lot to do lately."

"And what sort of stuff would that be?" asked Abby in a mock inquisitive manner. "We get the same assignements in class and I'm always done before you!"

"That would be because you're not as lazy as I am." responded Ashley with a cheeky grin. The three girls laughed. "What about you two, everything been good?"

"It has..." said Abby offhandedly. "Except Jenna here gave me the worst tickling of my life yesterday for no good reason!"

"Oh come on, you started it!" said Jenna in indignation. "You know not to tickle my feet when I'm trying to read. Besides, I know you loved it really." She reached down below the rim of the table and gave Abby's side a playful pinch, causing the latter to jolt in her chair and swat Jenna's hand away.

"Well that's good, because today you might be able to get some revenge on her." Ashley told Abby mysteriously.

"Huh! What do you mean Ash?" both sisters asked.

"Well, I didn't tell you in my text yesterday but my parents are on vacation in Europe and my brother's gone on a school trip to Washington. I've got the place to myself for a week!" It was evident that she'd been waiting impatiently to reveal this surprise. "Plus my dad keeps a lot of rope and duct tape in the garage. Basically, we can do whatever we want for a week!"

Jenna and Abby could hardly believe their ears but they were delighted and excited all the same.

"So what shall we do first girls?"

The front door swung open to reveal Danielle's older sister, Sara. She was 16 and taller than both sisters, though the difference between her and Jenna was only noticeable upon close inspection. She had green eyes and long strawberry blonde hair which cascaded down across her bare shoulders. Today she was wearing a green tube top which came down to just above her navel, exposing her bellybutton. She also wore tight-fitting dark jeans. Though the sisters did not get the chance to see Sara as often as Danielle, they were always happy in her company. She had a warm, accommodating personality and a good relationship with her younger sister. Although more mature than Danielle, this had never prevented Sara from playfully catching her sibling unawares, by suddenly squeezing her sides or running a stray finger across an unsuspecting foot, whenever the opportunity presented itself. While she had her own friends, she had spent her share of time running around with the three on various occasions and as such was no stranger to the activities which they would commonly partake in. Far from being a killjoy, she was an eager participator in almost anything and a welcome accompaniment to any event.

"Hi guys!!" Sara exclaimed as she swept down the front steps to hug each of the sisters in turn. "How are you doing? God, it's been so long since we've seen each other! I've been away so long."

"Where did you go?" asked Abby as they entered the house, shutting the door behind them.

134112212112121222212111.content:
Having the same idea at the same time, Abby and Jenna gave each other sly looks, before Jenna spoke to my.

"Hey Amy, you've got something on your shirt here. Just near your armpit."

"What? Where?"

Amy lifted her arm up, and that was all it took. Abby grabbed her two arms and brought them over her head, and pinned the kid to the ground. Amy already knew what was about to happen as Abby sat above her and Jenna positioned herself above her midsection.

"So, you REALLY like being tickled, Amy? Let's see if we can make even you break!"

Amy giggled, and gave a mocking "Oh no!", before Abby started scraping her fingernails against her armpits. Amy immediately squealed and started moving from side to side as best she could. Not about to let Amy escape, Jenna started squeezing her sides, sending the young girl into hysterics. She thrashed and wiggled as best she could, but the two sisters held her down; amazingly, despite all her laughter, she never once cried out for it to stop. Jenna soon noticed that Amy's shirt had come loose, exposing a few inches of her pale lower belly. A couple finger pokes to the area caused Amy's laughter to spike, and Jenna smirked. Abby noticed it too, and they stopped tickling Amy for a second while Jenna took the time to roll up her shirt to just under her ribcage. This exposed a pale, slightly chubby tummy, with a very prominent ball-shaped outie in the middle.

Amy shrunk her head down into her shoulders in anticipation, as Jenna and Abby continued their attack. With her bare belly now a victim, Amy's laughter increased, though she still never called out for help. She certainly seemed to be enjoying it, prompting the two older sisters to increase their efforts. Abby dug her fingers into Amy's hollows while Jenna scribbled all across the helpless tummy in front of her. She decided to do circles with her hands, going round and around, slowly bringing her fingers closer to the center. Amy shrieked, knowing what was coming, and was helpless when it arrived. Jenna reached her belly button, poking it and tickling it with her fingers, driving Amy bananas with laughter. Her face turned red, and Abby thought they had her.

"Ready to give up?"

"NOHAHAHANOHAHA! KEEEP GOINGAHAHAHAHA!!!"

The two sisters looked at each other, and silently crafted a devilish idea that would be sure to make Amy break. They stopped, and Abby moved herself over next to her sister while Amy caught her breath. She made no attempt to bring her arms down as the two sisters positioned themselves above her belly, and her eyes grew wide when she correctly guessed what would happen next. Jenna and Abby brought their lips to her tummy and blew huge raspberries, causing Amy to cry out in laughter again. They didn't relent, and attacked again, before deciding to alternate. Abby and Jenna took turns blowing quick but powerful raspberries on their new friend's belly button, driving her into hysterics.

But finally, admitting defeat, they stopped. Amy pulled her shirt down and sat up, still giggling, but she smiled.

"Told ya I wouldn't give up!"

"Well, I see you found Amy's ticklish spot!"

The three turned around to see two women approaching them in the park. The first one appeared only in her late thirties, and had long very curly blond hair; she wore a buttoned-up white shirt over a pair of jeans, and a pair of fancy shoes. Next to her was another blonde, only in her late teens; she was more interested in her phone than the commotion around her, and wore a pair of black leggings and a loose-fitting crop top that barely showed an inch of her belly. It was immediately apparent that they were Amy's mother and older sister. The two introduced themselves respectively as Mrs. Jones, and Ashley.

"Well Amy, it looks like you've made new friends! And quite capable ticklers at that!"

Amy blushed, and Abby and Jenna introduced themselves. Mrs. Jones invited the two sisters to spend the rest of the day with their new friend, and after calling their mom for her approval, they happily agreed. As they walked to their new destination, Amy tugged at Abby and Jenna's arms and whispered.

"They have belly buttons just like mine!"

Abby and Jenna smiled, and began to think of ways they could use that information. Mrs. Jones seemed so sweet, and after earlier, they felt they had plenty of experience tickling older women. And Ashley seemed a little rude; a typical older teenager that could use a few laughs. They planned their next moves as the group headed to their next destination.
134112212112121222212111.title: Pounced on amy

1341122121121212222121111.content:
After proposing they head out of the park to somewhere else, Mrs. Jones led the four girls to the parking lot; her vehicle was a small, but stylish, car that seeated five. A lightbulb went off in Jenna's head, and she whispered her plan to Abby and Amy, who giggled and accepted.

Mrs. Jones and Ashley sat in the front, and the three younger girls piled in; Abby sat behind Ashley, Jenna behind Mrs. Jones, and Amy in the middle. They sat patiently, and waited for the two older women to put on their seatbelts.

"NOW!"

At Jenna's call, the three girls leapt forward and grabbed the arms of their targets, pulling them down to their sides while also grabbing the seatbelts and pulling them tight. The result was Mrs. Jones and Ashley sitting with their arms down, trapped by their seatbelts, unable to unbuckle themselves. Both let out a yelp when they were grabbed, and were surprised by the attack, but while Ashley squirmed and tried to get out, Amy's mother chuckled to herself.

"Oh dear! I expected there to be some tickling later, but I never thought you'd get me like this! Oh well!"

Ashley, on the other hand, was mad.

"No! No! Please don't, Amy, I hate being tickled! Stop!"

Amy looked at Abby and Jenna, and smiled.

"Ready to see their weak spots?"

She reached forward in the car in between her mother and sister, and poked Ashley in the side. She squirmed and slid down, causing her shirt to ride up and reveal more of her pale belly. She then turned to the side and unbuttoned the bottom few buttons on her mother's shirt, pulling the sides apart. The result was two prominent ball-shaped outie belly buttons on display, just like the one Amy had herself. With her kind mother and rude teenage sister at her mercy, Amy turned around and smirked at Abby and Jenna.

134112212112121222212121111.content:
"All right, now these aren't as intense as our regular attractions. There's no need for a swimsuit, but we would like you to take off your shoes and show your bellies!"

At Olivia's instruction, the three girls took off their shoes, though Abby swore she saw the young Amy with an evil look in her eyes. Ignoring it as a figment of her imagination, Abby rolled up and tucked the sides of her shirt in, while Jenna tied the front of hers in a knot, revealing the sisters' belly buttons that the older women had had so much fun with before. They sat down in the chairs, which immediately clicked and trapped the two in wrist and ankle restraints. A series of tickling tools on adjustable arms was nearby, and Amy took a keen interest in it. Isabella gently tapped her on the shoulder.

"Well? Would you like your tummy tickled?"

"Oh yes please! But I don't know how to tie a knot like Jenna did."

"Oh, that's easy! Here, allow me!"

Olivia knelt down and tied Amy's green shirt into a crop top, revealing a pale belly with a big ball outie in the center. Olivia laughed.

"Aww, look at that! Your belly button is the same as mine! That's adorable!"

The devilish glint returned to Amy's eyes.

"Really? Can I see?"

Olivia smiled, and lifted up the bottom of her blouse. Sure enough, in the middle of her tummy was an outie, not as prominent as Amy's, but still noticeable. And at the sight of the bare belly in front of her, Amy reached out and poked the older woman in the sides. Olivia yelped and stumbled backwards, tripping and falling into one of the break room chairs, which activated its restraints and trapped her inside. As Olivia laughed and struggled to get out, Isabella chuckled. Jenna and Abby smirked at how the young Amy had so easily managed to trick Olivia.

"Oh Olivia, how careless!" said Isabella as she reached out to undo Olivia's restraints. However, doing so exposed her armpits, and Amy reached up and gave them both a soft tickle each as well. Isabella threw her arms down in self-defense, and Amy pushed her backwards, causing her to fall and get locked in the chair beside Olivia. Around the rims of the disks were small feathers, and Amy grinned at the sight of them. She brought them to Abbey's sides and turned them on, and they began to spin rapidly, producing a constant stream of feathers brushing by Abbey's sides. Her laughter doubled.

Amy then moved on over to Jenna, who was too busy laughing to see what was coming. Enjoying how much variety she had with these tools, Amy looked to see what attachments she could use; she settled on two rubber gloves, each with an index finger pointed out. Adjusting the metal arms so that the fingers were poking Jenna's armpits, she activated them and watched as they came to life. While most of the hands were motionless, the outstretched latex fingers began moving around in circles; they were slower than the disks that were torturing Abbey, but just as effective, and Jenna was driven to madness as her armpits were tortured.

Amy then looked at Isabella and Olivia. She had only just met the older women, and didn't know quite where their most ticklish spots were. Sure, their belly buttons were very sensitive, and she shuddered when she saw Olivia's outie being tickled. Still, she wanted more. There was the feet, but it seemed too obvious. Sides and armpits were good bets, but she was already using them, and wanted to be more creative.

The closer she looked at the women, she noticed their sizeable chests bouncing up and down. Olivia's buttoned-up blouse looked like it would burst, and the thin shoulder straps on Isabella's dress were going to slide off any moment. Amy wasn't too sure about tickling their bare breasts, but it wouldn't hurt to test out what they were already exposing, right?

She looked at the chairs and found a large feather duster; she attached it to a drill-like end on one of the arms, and tested it in the air. With their eyes closed this entire time, neither of the women saw it coming, and their surprise was evident when they shrieked and started bucking around as much as they could. This girl was less than half their age! How did she manage to trick them?

Amy sat back and enjoyed her work. She loved being tickled, of course, but something about having Abbey, Jenna, Olivia, and Isabella all at her mercy was completely new to her. After nearly ten minutes, she decided a new break was in order. Amy looked around the room, and saw that there were three empty chairs left. If she were to continue trying to take over the carnival, she best try to fill them up. However, she could also use some helpers, especially if they were gullible. Either way, she didn't want the girls passing out while she was gone, so she switched the machine off. After a quick poke to the bellies of her victims, Amy smiled, said she'd be right back, and ducked out the door.
